secrets.passphraseComplexityRequired: Must include uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol
secrets.theyll-appear-here-once-youve-shared-the: They'll appear here once you've shared them.
secrets.sample-secret-content-this-could-be-sens: Sample secret content This could be sensitive data Or a multi-line message
secrets.you-can-safely-close-this-tab: You can close this window when done.
secrets.enter-the-secret-content-to-share-here: Enter the secret content to share here
secrets.when-ready-click-the-view-secret-button-: When ready, click the button at the top of the page to reveal your one-time message.
secrets.yes-after-viewing-the-secret-is-permanen: Yes. After viewing, the secret is permanently deleted from our servers, ensuring your privacy.
secrets.onetime-secret-is-a-secure-way-to-share-: Onetime Secret is a secure way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after a single viewing.
secrets.before-you-open-it-heres-what-you-should: Before you open it, here's what you should know:
secrets.a-secure-one-time-message-awaits-you: A secure, one-time message awaits you.
secrets.that-information-is-no-longer-available: This secret has been viewed or expired.

private.this_msg_is_encrypted: This message is encrypted with your passphrase.
private.only_see_once: Careful: you will only see this once.
private.created_securely: Your secret has been created securely
private.the-burn-feature-lets-you-permanently-de: The burn feature lets you permanently delete a secret before anyone views it. This is useful if you need to revoke access or shared the wrong information. Once burned, the secret cannot be recovered.
private.your-secret-will-remain-available-for-re: Your secret will remain available for {0} or until it's viewed, whichever comes first. After either condition is met, the secret is permanently deleted.
private.for-security-reasons-we-cant-recover-los: For security reasons, we can't recover lost secret links. You'll need to create a new secret and generate a new link. We recommend copying the link immediately after creation.
private.we-display-the-value-for-you-so-that-you: We display the value for you so that you can verify it but we do that once so that if someone gets this private page (in your browser history or if you accidentally send the private link instead of the secret one), they won't see the secret value.
private.why-can-i-only-see-the-secret-value-once: Why can I only see the secret value once?
private.burning-a-secret-permanently-deletes-it-: Burning a secret permanently deletes it before anyone can read it. The recipient will see a message indicating the secret doesn't exist. This is useful if you accidentally share the wrong information or need to prevent access.
private.what-happens-when-i-burn-a-secret: What happens when I burn a secret?
private.and-never-stored-in-its-original-form-th: and never stored in its original form. This approach means we can't access or recover your secret - only someone with the correct passphrase can.
private.each-secret-can-only-be-viewed-once-afte: Each secret can only be viewed once. After viewing, it's permanently deleted from our servers. This ensures your sensitive information isn't accidentally exposed through browser history or mistakenly shared private links.

shared.viewed_own_secret: You have viewed your own secret. It is no longer available for anyone else.
shared.you_created_this_secret: You created this secret. If you view it, the recipient will not be able to see it.
shared.pre_reveal_default: Click the button below to reveal your secure message.
shared.post_reveal_default: Your secure message is shown below.
